run_neb module¶

run_neb.run_neb_calc(folder, elem, lat_par, sigma, mis, size, b, h, partitions, mode, potential, mpi_location, lammps_location)[source]¶

Run the neb input file

Parameters:

  • folder (string) – input folder.

  • elem (string) – Element.

  • lat_par (float) – Lattice parameter.

  • sigma (int) – Sigma value of GB.

  • mis (float) – misorientation.

  • size (int) – Size of system in terms of period.

  • b (float) – Burgers vector of GB.

  • h (float) – Step height of GB.

  • partitions (int) – Number of partitions to be used for NEB.

  • mode (int) – mode = 0 -> Initial to final NEB run. mode = 1 -> NEB run with intermediate images

  • potential (string) – Path to the potential file to be used in the simulation.

  • mpi_location (string) – Path to mpirun executable.

  • lammps_location (string) – Path to lmp_mpi executable.

Return type:

0

run_neb.write_lammps_neb_input_script(folder, elem, lat_par, sigma, mis, size, b, h, partitions, mode, potential)[source]¶

Writes lammps file to run neb calculations

Parameters:

  • folder (string) – input folder.

  • elem (string) – Element.

  • lat_par (float) – Lattice parameter.

  • sigma (int) – Sigma value of GB.

  • mis (float) – misorientation.

  • size (int) – Size of system in terms of period.

  • b (float) – Burgers vector of GB.

  • h (float) – Step height of GB.

  • partitions (int) – Number of partitions to be used for NEB.

  • mode (int) – mode = 0 -> Initial to final NEB run. mode = 1 -> NEB run with intermediate images

  • potential (string) – Path to the potential file to be used in the simulation.

Returns:

  • file (string) – Path to input file for neb calculation.

  • output_folder (string) – Path to output generated by neb calculation.
